data:
## function_callWidgetFactoryWithConfig
> **callWidgetFactoryWithConfig**\<`W`\>(`factory`, `options?`): [`WidgetSlotContext`](../types#widgetslotcontext)\<`W`\>


Call a widget factory using provided configs.

### Type Parameters

#### W

`W` *extends* [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<`object`, `object`, `object`, `object`\>

### Parameters

#### factory

[`WidgetFactory`](../types#widgetfactory)\<`W`\>

the widget factory to call

#### options?

the optional options

##### defaultConfig?

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\> \| [`ReadableSignal`](https://amadeusitgroup.github.io/tansu/interfaces/ReadableSignal.html)\<`undefined` \| [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\>\>

the default config of the widget

##### events?

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`Pick`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#picktype-keys)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>, keyof [`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\> & `` `on${string}Change` ``\>\>

the events of the widget

##### props?

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\>

the props of the widget

##### widgetConfig?

`null` \| [`ReadableSignal`](https://amadeusitgroup.github.io/tansu/interfaces/ReadableSignal.html)\<`undefined` \| [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`WidgetProps`](../types#widgetprops)\<`W`\>\>\>

the config of the widget, overriding the defaultConfig

### Returns

[`WidgetSlotContext`](../types#widgetslotcontext)\<`W`\>

the state, api and directives to track and interact with the widget

## function_createWidgetFactory
> **createWidgetFactory**\<`W`, `T`\>(`widgetName`, `factory`): [`WidgetFactory`](../types#widgetfactory)\<`W`, `T`\>


Define a widget factory that can be linked with configuration through the provided widget name.

### Type Parameters

#### W

`W` *extends* [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<`object`, `object`, `object`, `object`\>

The type of the widget

#### T

`T` *extends* (`config?`) => `W` = (`config?`) => `W`

The type of the widget factory function. Useful when the widget factory has a generic.

### Parameters

#### widgetName

`string`

the widget name, used for configuration injection

#### factory

`T`

the widget factory function

### Returns

[`WidgetFactory`](../types#widgetfactory)\<`W`, `T`\>

the widget factory
